segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, drying a stupid plate while the sink floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's gushing out, ruining everything, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked in that mess, and she's oblivious—infuriating!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up on the counter, probably next to get wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids— that boy climbing on an unstable stool like an idiot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall and break his neck, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's encouraging him, hand out like it's all a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets, cookies everywhere—such blatant rule-breaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside mocks this indoor negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can no one see the dangers right under their noses?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup screams irresponsibility and frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching potential accidents unfold like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap out of it before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
